Name: Daniel Defence RIS II 12.5' AR-15 Compatible System Handguard BLK
Description: The Daniel Defence RIS II 12.5' handguard is part of the SOPMOD Block II program, designed to replace the standard M4CQBR or Mk18 handguards used by US SOCOM. Made of lightweight and durable aerospace aluminum, it features 4 rails for mounting additional equipment and accessories. This handguard is not compatible with underbarrel-mounted M203 grenade launchers.
